text:
@WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump I had to go to the doctor today so I asked him "what's the most important thing I could do to avoid the coronavirus?"
With a straight face he said "change your last name to Trump!"
At first I didn't get it....but he's right.
Sad. #Kakistocracy #VoteBlueNoMatterWho #MAGA #Trump
